name: Asonde Kazu Suuji
overview: Asonde Kazu Suuji is an educational game similar to the Kids Station or Lightspan game series, in which the young kids can learn mathematics. This time the game allows the young players to learn about numbers, quantities, how to read the clock, big numbers up to 1000, how to arrange numbers, etc. meanwhile they are playing cute mini games with 8 different animal characters as their host and 5 difficulty levels in each of them.
